content.html: Bonus: Persevering when it's not looking good. Most devs know a brute force approach to a problem works when all else fails. But many don't take that attitude toward career problems. They become easily demoralized or disengaged. So much success in life comes down to grit.
content.value:
Bonus: Persevering when it's not looking good.

Most devs know a brute force approach to a problem works when all else fails.

But many don't take that attitude toward career problems. They become easily demoralized or disengaged.

So much success in life comes down to grit.
